activities:
CashStar provides a Software as a Service to our clients allowing them to offer a virtual or digital gift card to their customers. CashStar's clients are major U.S. retailers, restaurants, hotels and travel companies, and big box stores. Our primary services to our clients include order processing, fraud screening, digital gift card delivery via email, and customer support.
Recently CashStar has expanded to include the UK in its offering. As part of this service, CashStar will process customer data received from UK customers in the United States. Such data processing will be done on behalf of and at the direction of CashStar's clients.
contactoff1: CashStar, Inc. 129 Middle Street, 2nd Floor, Portland Maine 04101
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, client, and customer data, all of which may be manually processed
recoursemech:
If you are unhappy with the manner CashStar processes or otherwise uses your personal data, you may make a complaint to CashStar at the address below. If your complaint is not resolved to your satisfaction through our internal process, we agree to dispute resolution using JAMS as an independent third party dispute resolution provider.

CashStar, Inc.,
Attention: Legal Department
129 Middle Street, 2nd Floor
Portland, ME 04101 
Or email at: privacy@cashstar.com
We will respond to your inquiry within 30 days of its receipt.
